name: deep-thoughts
description: A MERN application where users can create an account, post their thoughts for others to see, and interact with other users through these thoughts. Made during the U of U coding bootcamp, this was my first full MERN stack project.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
